usage.cn: 只要是个喜剧结局，过程你让我怎么哭都行。
usage.eng: As long as it is a comedy, I'd rather cry during the process.

usage.cn: 有生之年，狭路相逢，终不能幸免。
usage.eng: It's unavoidable to come into confrontation with someone during the lifetime.

usage.cn: 失败时有人伸出一只手来为你擦泪，会好过成功时无数人伸手为你鼓掌。
usage.eng: A single hand that wipes tears during failures is much better than countless hands that come together to clap on success

usage.cn: 一个人一生可以爱上很多的人，等你获得真正属于你的幸福之后，你就会明白一起的伤痛其实是一种财富，它让你学会更好地去把握和珍惜你爱的人。
usage.eng: One may fall in love with many people during the lifetime. When you finally get your own happiness, you will understand the previous sadness is kind of treasure, which makes you better to hold and cherish the people you love.
